Title: Loyal
Plot: When Alice runs into her ex, she is surprised to find out that she is now dating Dana's ex-girlfriend. Bette and Tina reach an agreement over their relationship, Jenny is worried that she may have lost a writing job, and Shane finds some comfort in a church.
GuestStars: Christopher Shyer,  David Richmond-Peck,  Brendan Penny,  Dion Luther,  Sarah Hayward,  Michelle Harrison,  Guy Demong,  Pablo Coffey,  Warren Christie,  Eileen Bui,  Cameron MacDonald,  Guinevere Turner,  Sara
